Cell.Data: Bard and another man allegedly robbed someone at gunpoint. Bard was killed in an exchange of gunfire with pursuing officers, authorities said.
On April 17th, 2016 Richard Bard Jr was killed by a police officer at.
S East Ave & Almond St, Vineland, NJ 08360, USA

Wilson was reportedly suicidal and told police he was armed with an assault rifle and handguns. Two officers shot him when he 'pulled a dark object from his back area', police said. Investigators later said that what police believed was a firearm was actually a cellphone.
On April 17th, 2016 Eric Wilson was killed by a police officer at.
7200 Tierra Taos Dr, El Paso, TX 79912, USA
Swatsky was reportedly suicidal and armed with a gun. Police fatally shot him when he pointed the gun at officers, authorities said.
On April 15th, 2016 David Swatsky was killed by a police officer at.
300 SW Whitetail Dr, Cache, OK 73527, USA

Police patrolling in a high-crime area pursued Watts and two others after they took off running when a police car approached, authorities said. An officer then shot Watts as he tried to carjack a nearby woman's vehicle.
On April 13th, 2016 Rodney Watts was killed by a police officer at.

Police shot Clark after he reportedly slashed and injured an officer with a knife. Officers responded to Clark's house following a report of a domestic dispute. The injured officer was treated and released from the hospital.
On April 10th, 2016 William Clark III was killed by a police officer at.

Police said they stopped Flenaugh and detained him in the back of a patrol car after receiving reports of 'suspicious activity'. Authorities said Flenaugh was thrashing and kicking in the back of the car, and that when the officers stopped to try and secure him, he ran away. Flenaugh then allegedly broke into a home and armed himself with kitchen knives before threatening a woman. Officers said they shot him when he 'verbally challenged' them.
On April 8th, 2016 Dazion 'Jerome' Flenaugh was killed by a police officer at.
Creavens broke into the home of his ex-wife and threatened to kill her, she told reporters. Authorities said that deputies arrived at the house and shot Creavens after she managed to call 911.
On April 6th, 2016 Marvin Cremeans was killed by a police officer at.
1449 Monroe Hollow Rd, Oak Hill, OH 45656, USA

Sweatt was shot after she allegedly injured a sheriff's deputy who had arrived at her home to serve her with an eviction notice. Body camera footage shows an officer shooting Sweatt as she approaches with an ax.
On April 6th, 2016 Laronda Sweatt was killed by a police officer at.

Martin was pursued by an officer after being caught stealing from vehicles, according to authorities. After Martin was knocked to the ground, the two men got into a fight and Martin shot the officer, badly wounding him. The officer returned fire and Martin was fatally struck.
On April 3rd, 2016 Darrin Martin was killed by a police officer at.

Brown shot and killed trooper Chad Dermyer when Dermyer approached Brown during a training exercise at a Greyhound bus station, police said. Other troopers shot back and killed Brown. Authorities said two more people were injured during the exchange of gunfire.
On March 31st, 2016 James Brown III was killed by a police officer at.
An officer shot Tsingine after she reportedly threatened him with scissors. Police said Tsingine matched the description of a shoplifting suspect from a nearby convenience store.
On March 27th, 2016 Loreal Tsingine was killed by a police officer at.
323 N Williamson Ave, Winslow, AZ 86047, USA
Ashby was armed with a handgun and reportedly suicidal. A deputy shot Ashby when he pointed the gun at police and ignore commands to drop the weapon, police said.
On March 27th, 2016 Earl Ashby was killed by a police officer at.

McManamon was fatally shot by return fire after he began shooting at an officer in the parking lot of a hotel, according to authorities. The officer, who was wearing a bulletproof vest, was struck in the chest. Police had arrived to investigate reports of shots being fired between two vehicles. Another man was found dead at the scene.
On March 26th, 2016 Patrick McManamon was killed by a police officer at.

Officers responding to a report of domestic violence found Dussourd hiding underneath a car with a knife, police said. Dussourd crawled out from underneath the car and was shot when he allegedly brandished the knife. Authorities said the officers first tried to subdue him with a beanbag shotgun.
On March 24th, 2016 Robert Dussourd was killed by a police officer at.
E Division St, Braintree, MA 02184, USA
Police said they fatally shot Grenon at the end of a standoff when he approached officers with two knives. Authorities said Grenon was experiencing unspecified mental health issues.
On March 21st, 2016 Ralph 'Phil' Grenon was killed by a police officer at.
South Square Apartments, 101 College St, Burlington, VT 05401, USA

A Swat team responded to a 911 call from Pape's father, who said he was armed and suicidal. Officers said they shot Pape after a negotiation. Investigators later said that Pape was carrying a BB gun purchased hours before he was killed.
On March 21st, 2016 Dylan Pape was killed by a police officer at.
A deputy shot and killed Douglas after a car chase that started when Douglas refused to pull over following a traffic violation, state police said.
On March 19th, 2016 Joshua Douglas was killed by a police officer at.

Authorities said Avila broke into the officer's home. The officer, who was off duty at the time, fatally shot Avila after he ignored commands to lie on the floor and reached into his waistband, police said.
On March 16th, 2016 Vincent Avila was killed by a police officer at.
20000 Ochoa Rd, Apple Valley, CA 92307, USA

An off-duty officer said he saw Jose and another teenager breaking into the officer's car before the pair fled in their own car. The officer pursued Jose and fatally shot him after the pursuit ended in a crash, police said. The officer, Ken Johnson, resigned from the department after he was arrested.
On March 13th, 2016 Jose Cruz was killed by a police officer at.
Spring Valley Rd & Marsh Ln, Addison, TX 75001, USA

Police said Mongtgomery was shot after officers came under fire from the car he was in, which they had tried to stop. One officer was struck and wounded. Police returned fire, killing Montgomery and wounding another. A third person was arrested, according to authorities.
On March 12th, 2016 Keith Montgomery Jr was killed by a police officer at.
Parker St & Union St, Chester, PA 19013, USA

Authorities said Loud was shot dead during a fight in a pharmacy parking lot with an off-duty deputy working a security job. Loud was allegedly trying to carjack a vehicle when the confrontation began, and at one point grabbed the officer's Taser during the ensuing struggle.
On March 12th, 2016 Marco Loud was killed by a police officer at.
3833 Cypress Creek Pkwy, Houston, TX 77068, USA
Investigators said Gonzalez fled a traffic stop and tried to escape by stealing a car in a nearby gas station. He was shot when he accelerated towards officers, according to authorities.
On March 10th, 2016 German Gonzalez was killed by a police officer at.
A US Marshals deputy shot and killed Selsor while a fugitive taskforce was trying to serve two arrest warrants, authorities said.
On March 7th, 2016 Randall Selsor was killed by a police officer at.
504 SW Taylor St, Topeka, KS 66603, USA
Members of a drug taskforce were trying to arrest Chavez on old charges, state police said. Chavez was shot when he allegedly tried to flee in his car and struck an officer's vehicle.
On March 7th, 2016 Daniel Chavez was killed by a police officer at.
Carlsbad Police Department, Eddy County Sheriff's Office
N Happy Valley Rd & W Texas St, Carlsbad, NM 88220, USA

The man was reportedly drunk and had threatened another person with a gun. An officer said he saw the man standing next to a gun before running away. Police shot the man dead when he refused to show his hands, authorities said. Investigators said they later found the gun in the building where the chase started.
On March 6th, 2016 James 'Tony' Scott was killed by a police officer at.
E Rosser Ave & N 32nd St, Bismarck, ND 58501, USA
Bosell stole a gun from a relative and was killed when he approached an officer 'aggressively' with the gun in hand, police said.
On March 5th, 2016 Darrell Bosell was killed by a police officer at.

Corcino reportedly threatened to shoot three construction workers near his home. Police said an officer shot him after a two-hour standoff when Corcino left his home with a gun. His girlfriend said Corcino was an army veteran with mental health issues, including PTSD.
On March 1st, 2016 Dimitri Corcino was killed by a police officer at.
Mariposa Dr NE, Palm Bay, FL 32905, USA
Spencer was brandishing a BB gun near a busy intersection and was killed after a confrontation with police, authorities said. Police said initially thought his gun was real.
On February 26th, 2016 Kionte Spencer was killed by a police officer at.

Officers pursued Rivera, who was driving a stolen vehicle, after he refused to pull over, police said. When he stopped, he hit multiple police vehicles with his car before officers shot him, according to authorities.
On February 24th, 2016 Victor Rivera was killed by a police officer at.
W McDowell Rd & N 75th Ave, Phoenix, AZ 85035, USA

Ramos was armed with a machete and got into a fight with an officer, authorities said. A constable shot the man when he refused to drop the weapon, according to investigators. His sister identified him after his death and said he had been diagnosed with schizophrenia.
On February 23rd, 2016 Baltazar Ramos was killed by a police officer at.
Buckner was alleged to have fatally shot his parents and two younger sisters before setting their family home on fire. Police said that Buckner was then killed when he pointed a gun at officers.
On February 23rd, 2016 Alex Buckner was killed by a police officer at.
4800 W Sunnyside Ave, Glendale, AZ 85304, USA

Kruger allegedly went into someone's home and stole a gun. The homeowner fled and Kruger fired the gun several times before she pointed it at a responding trooper and was fatally shot, investigators said.
On February 22nd, 2016 Patricia Kruger was killed by a police officer at.

Police said Perea shot and killed his former girlfriend before leading multiple agencies on a car chase during which he fired at officers. Authorities killed him at the end of the chase after he shot at officers, according to officials.
On February 20th, 2016 Marcos Perea was killed by a police officer at.
Lakewood Police Department, Pierce County Sheriff's Department, Steilacoom Department of Public Safety

Noel was involved in a domestic disturbance at his father's house, according to police. Officers said they shot him when he approached them with an unidentified object, which the officers believed was a gun.
On February 18th, 2016 Joseph Noel was killed by a police officer at.

Meikle crashed his car into two buildings before hitting an officer while trying to leave the area, according to police. The officer said he fatally shot Meikle when he continued driving and the officer thought he would be struck again. Meikle's family said he was epileptic and might have been having a seizure during the incident.
On February 16th, 2016 Destry Meikle was killed by a police officer at.
S Peach Tree Ln, Republic, MO 65738, USA

Sauceda was attempting to burglarize a home when he ignored commands to drop his gun and shot at responding officers, police said. Officers shot back, killing Sauceda. One officer was injured in the exchange of gunfire.
On February 15th, 2016 Guadalupe Sauceda was killed by a police officer at.
Lea County Sheriffs Office, Jal Police Department

Perkins attacked two people inside a store before breaking into a nearby home and attacking two more people, police said. Perkins later jumped through a window and assaulted one of two responding deputies before both deputies fatally shot him.
On February 13th, 2016 Dyzhawn Perkins was killed by a police officer at.
Fanfan was killed in an exchange of gunfire with police, authorities said. Officers said they were responding to reports of a shooting nearby.
On February 12th, 2016 Peter Fanfan was killed by a police officer at.
Stanwood St & Laredo St, Boston, MA 02121, USA

Barry attacked diners in a restaurant with a machete, injuring four people, police said. Officers said they later stopped Barry and fatally shot him when he got out of his car with the machete and moved toward police.
On February 11th, 2016 Mohamed Barry was killed by a police officer at.

David, who was naked, was 'behaving aggressively', according to authorities, and was fatally shot when he charged at an officer. The officer was fired in March following an internal investigation into the shooting.
On February 8th, 2016 David Joseph was killed by a police officer at.
300 E Yager Ln, Austin, TX 78753, USA

When officers tried to arrest Laniado's girlfriend, the pair barricaded themselves inside their home, police said. During negotiations, a Swat team fired teargas into the home, and Laniado left the building holding his girlfriend at knifepoint. Investigators said an officer fatally shot Laniado when he began to move toward officers with a knife and was not stopped by bean bag rounds.
On February 6th, 2016 Michael Laniado was killed by a police officer at.
1881 Rte 37 W, Toms River, NJ 08757, USA
Thibodeaux was fatally shot by her husband, a reserve police officer who was off-duty at the time of the shooting, according to authorities.
On February 5th, 2016 Emily Thibodeaux was killed by a police officer at.
3600 E Nic Dr, Addis, LA 70710, USA
Clarke had Asperger syndrome and was reportedly suicidal. He charged at officers with a knife, police said. Clarke, a transgender man, was initially identified by authorities as Danielle Jacobs.
On February 4th, 2016 Kayden Clarke was killed by a police officer at.
E Brown Rd & N 80th St, Mesa, AZ 85207, USA
Neuman was involved in a crash with a tractor-trailer rig, authorities said. A deputy shot Neuman when he fired at emergency responders.
On February 3rd, 2016 John Neuman was killed by a police officer in.
An off-duty, part-time officer fatally shot Molinaro after a confrontation, according to authorities. The officer was later charged with homicide.
On February 2nd, 2016 Joseph Molinaro was killed by a police officer at.

Sinclair led troopers and deputies on a car chase before stopping at the Missouri River, police said. Officers shot Sinclair with a bean-bag round and then fatally shot him after he fired at the officers.
On January 30th, 2016 Jeremy Sinclair was killed by a police officer in.
Missouri State Highway Patrol, Jackson County Sheriff's Office
Dew allegedly robbed a cash loan store before taking an employee hostage at gunpoint. Police shot him as he tried to force the hostage inside a car, according to authorities.
On January 29th, 2016 Christopher Dew was killed by a police officer at.
An officer encountered Scanlon while investigating a trespassing call, police said. Officials said Scanlon was killed and the officer injured when the two exchanged gunfire.
On January 27th, 2016 Scott Scanlon was killed by a police officer at.
Little Blakely Creek Rd, Jessieville, AR 71949, USA
An officer fatally shot Flores at a motel while investigating an armed robbery, authorities said. Flores allegedly exchanged fire with police before being struck.
On January 27th, 2016 Herman Flores was killed by a police officer at.
3007 Cerrillos Rd, Santa Fe, NM 87507, USA

Finicum was the spokesman for the armed militia that occupied a national wildlife refuge in protest of the federal government's policies on public land. He was killed by officers in a shootout after his group was stopped while traveling on a rural highway, authorities said.
On January 26th, 2016 Robert 'LaVoy' Finicum was killed by a police officer at.
Sanders was reportedly armed with a gun and acting strangely. He refused to show his hands to a deputy before he was shot, police said.
On January 20th, 2016 Randy Sanders Jr was killed by a police officer at.
US-231 & Inspirational Dr, Meridianville, AL 35759, USA

Shaver allegedly pointed a pellet gun out of a hotel window, which several hotel guests believed was real. Police said he did not cooperate with responding officers and reached toward his lower back several times before an officer shot him. Authorities later said they found two pellet guns in Shaver's hotel room. The officer involved was fired from the department and has been charged with murder.
On January 18th, 2016 Daniel Shaver was killed by a police officer at.
6530 E Superstition Springs Blvd, Mesa, AZ 85206, USA

Police shot Provost when he walked out of his apartment carrying an airsoft gun which responding officers thought was real, police said. Officers were performing a welfare check on Provost at his father's request.
On January 18th, 2016 Eric Provost was killed by a police officer at.
Police shot Herrera after he walked toward officers with a knife, according to officials. Officers were responding to reports that he was armed with a hunting knife.
On January 17th, 2016 Efrain Herrera Jr was killed by a police officer at.
8800 Norwich Ave, North Hills, CA 91343, USA

When officers went to arrest Karjalainen for allegedly violating his probation, Karjalainen moved toward the officers and took a gun out of his pocket, police said. An officer shot Karjalainen when he ignored commands and continued to move forward. Investigators later said the gun was a replica.
On January 16th, 2016 Adam Karjalainen was killed by a police officer at.
10100 SW Murray Blvd, Beaverton, OR 97008, USA

A constable serving an eviction order had a rifle pointed at him by Ciara's father, Donald Meyer. The officer fired a shot at Meyer that traveled through his arm and struck Ciara. Constables in Pennsylvania are independent officers with arrest powers who can be certified to carry guns. Meyer was charged with criminal homicide in her death.
On January 11th, 2016 Ciara Meyer was killed by a police officer at.
Officers shot Kent after he threatened them with a chainsaw, according to authorities. Kent died at the scene.
On January 9th, 2016 David Kent was killed by a police officer at.
Cowlitz County Sheriff's Office, Kelso Police Department
8900 Rose Valley Rd, Kelso, WA 98626, USA

Deputies responded to a domestic violence call and were interviewing the 911 caller outside her home when Abernathy exited the house with a gun, police said. Abernathy allegedly ignored deputies' commands to drop the gun and was shot when he approached the officers and raised the gun.
On January 8th, 2016 Andrew Abernathy was killed by a police officer at.
4500 Bartow Carver Rd SE, Acworth, GA 30102, USA
Hollstein was allegedly taking photos of schools when police began to pursue him. Officers chased Hollstein on foot before shooting him during a physical struggle, according to authorities.
On January 6th, 2016 Charles Hollstein was killed by a police officer at.
Murphy opened fire on responding officers and was killed when one officer shot back, police said. Officers were responding to a report of a shooting in the area.
On January 5th, 2016 Carlton Murphy Jr was killed by a police officer at.

Police were serving a warrant at a home when several armed people, including Wallace, confronted them and began shooting, according to authorities. Officers shot back, killing Wallace, police said. One officer was struck and injured, according to officials. Police said Wallace was wanted in connection with a recent killing.
On January 3rd, 2016 Germonta Wallace was killed by a police officer at.

Light allegedly shot and killed another man before fleeing in his car, police said. Light was shot after pointing a gun at the officers pursuing him. He died from his injuries about a week after the shooting.
On January 2nd, 2016 Lance Light was killed by a police officer at.

Police said Childress was shot when he began advancing toward them and ignored commands to drop an object in his hand. The object, which police said they mistook for a gun, turned out to be his cell phone. Officers were pursuing Childress because they had been mistakenly told he was wanted for attempted murder, according to authorities.
On December 31st, 2015 Keith Childress Jr was killed by a police officer at.
Gilded Crown Ct, Las Vegas, NV 89117, USA

Niesen was fatally shot outside a police station when he threw a rock or brick at an officer, according to authorities. He had allegedly also thrown rocks at a patrol car and station window moments earlier.
On December 26th, 2015 Lonnie Niesen was killed by a police officer at.
Police said Gunning was shot by officers as he drove towards a road block and refused to stop his vehicle. Gunning was being pursued for allegedly driving recklessly.
On December 24th, 2015 Schuylar Gunning was killed by a police officer at.
Reynolds allegedly fired at a Ludlow police officer who had stopped him for a traffic violation. The officer was struck in the shoulder before returning fire and killing Reynolds.
On December 22nd, 2015 Charles Reynolds was killed by a police officer at.
Officers shot Stephens when he pointed a rifle at them inside a home, investigators said. Police were conducting a drug raid.
On December 22nd, 2015 Kenneth Stephens was killed by a police officer at.
Vermont State Police, Drug Enforcement Administration

Teter allegedly got into an argument with a cab driver over the fare and pulled out a gun when the driver called police. Deputies shot him when he refused to drop his weapon, according to authorities.
On December 21st, 2015 Robert Teter was killed by a police officer at.

Waters was shocked with a Taser after he brandished a gun at state troopers who were searching for someone else, according to authorities. Waters went into cardiac arrest and spent about 20 days in hospital before dying.
On December 20th, 2015 Lionel Waters was killed by a police officer at.
Milford Harrington Hwy, Harrington, DE 19952, USA

Frerichs was fatally shot after running down two deputies in his vehicle, according to police. He had fled the deputies as they tried to arrest him for attempting to steal from a sports store. The deputies said they deployed Tasers as Frerichs resisted arrest.
On December 18th, 2015 Amos Frerichs was killed by a police officer at.
145 Moss Grove Blvd, Knoxville, TN 37922, USA

Fletcher refused to stop riding his bicycle when police tried to pull him over, authorities said. Officers said they pursued Fletcher and shot him when they realized he was armed and ignored commands to drop his gun.
On December 17th, 2015 Christopher Fletcher was killed by a police officer at.

McKinnis, an army veteran, was shot after an officer who had stopped him heard a gunshot as he walked toward McKinnis's car, according to authorities. A gun was found next to McKinnis's body. He had been stopped for a suspected license plate violation.
On December 14th, 2015 Calvin McKinnis was killed by a police officer at.
8800 Chef Menteur Hwy, New Orleans, LA 70127, USA

Toney allegedly stabbed two people in a domestic violence incident. He was shot by police after he pointed a shotgun at officers when they arrived at his house, police said. The stabbing victims were treated for their wounds.
On December 14th, 2015 Mark Toney was killed by a police officer at.
Co Rte 16/17, Mt Hope, WV 25880, USA

Carreon was allegedly holding a woman at knifepoint in front of his two children when officers arrived. Authorities said the woman freed herself and the officer shot Carreon after he refused to obey orders to put down the knife.
On December 12th, 2015 Roy Carreon was killed by a police officer at.
500 Tia Juana St N, San Bernardino, CA 92411, USA

Eagle emerged from a home several times armed with a pistol and a knife during a standoff, according to authorities. Officers had arived in response that he was acting strangely. Police said when they attempted to rescue a small child, Eagle moved towards an officer and the officer fired.
On December 12th, 2015 Javario Eagle was killed by a police officer at.
5113 Woodland View Cir, Chattanooga, TN 37410, USA

Wickert, a national guard soldier, was shot when he allegedly tried to strangle a sheriff's deputy who had arrived at a company holiday party in response to an emergency call. Officials said Wickert's girlfriend had reported her purse stolen, but the deputy determined that Wickert had in fact been violent towards her.
On December 11th, 2015 Steven Wickert was killed by a police officer at.
Pima County Sheriff's Department, Pima County Attorney's Office
5500 E Sunrise Dr, Tucson, AZ 85750, USA
Echols was shot after allegedly leaving his house and pointing a rifle at officers. He was reportedly suicidal and had barricaded himself in the home when officers arrived, according to authorities.
On December 9th, 2015 Sammy Echols Jr was killed by a police officer at.
100 Quail Dr, Sportsmen Acres, OK 74361, USA
Azevedo allegedly shot at pursuing officers while leading police on a car chase after stealing two vehicles at gunpoint. Officers killed Azevedo when they returned fire, according to authorities.
On December 6th, 2015 Raymond Azevedo was killed by a police officer at.
35th Ave NE & NE 68th St, Seattle, WA 98115, USA
A police officer killed Perez while investigating reports of a stolen golf cart. Authorities said Perez was armed and died in an exchange of gunfire with the officer.
On December 5th, 2015 Juan Perez was killed by a police officer at.

Police said Woods, who allegedly stabbed someone earlier in the day, ignored commands to drop his knife and approached officers with the weapon. Video footage filmed by a witness showed Woods circled by officers who were pointing guns at him. He appeared to be shot when he staggered to one side.
On December 2nd, 2015 Mario Woods was killed by a police officer at.
2900 Keith St, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA

Smith was a passenger in a car that was driving against traffic and crashed after fleeing a police stop, according to authorities. As Smith and the driver tried to leave the scene, Smith exchanged gunfire with officers and was fatally struck.
On November 30th, 2015 Darius Smith was killed by a police officer at.
300 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308, USA

Authorities said McHenry parked his car and walked up to a trooper's patrol car late at night, before ordering the trooper to get out. McHenry then allegedly pulled out a handun and pointed it at the trooper, who shot McHenry after failing to disarm him.
On November 29th, 2015 Justin McHenry was killed by a police officer at.
N Main St & W Livingston St, Celina, OH 45822, USA

Close was shot dead after allegedly charging at police from his home with a baseball bat and a poker. Officers had arrived in response to a 911 call in which Close said he was murdering someone. Police said they found Close's girlfriend bludgeoned to death inside the house.
On November 28th, 2015 Kevin Close was killed by a police officer at.
Baez exchanged gunfire with police officers at an apartment building when they responded to a report of domestic violence, according to authorities.
On November 24th, 2015 Freddy Baez was killed by a police officer at.
A Swat team entered Martinez's home after a standoff lasting more than five hours, police said. Martinez, who was wanted on a robbery charge, was then killed in an exchange of gunfire.
On November 22nd, 2015 Miguel Martinez was killed by a police officer at.
305 S Alcott St, Denver, CO 80219, USA

Nichols allegedly ran from an officer and the two ended up in a struggle. According to police, Nichols was on top of the officer and struck him in the face before the officer drew his weapon and fired.
On November 21st, 2015 Christopher Nichols was killed by a police officer at.

Smith got out of a car and began struggling with deputies who were investigating what they called a 'suspicious vehicle' in a supermarket parking lot. Both deputies used their Tasers, according to authorities, and a deputy shot Smith when he pulled out a handgun.
On November 19th, 2015 Randy Smith was killed by a police officer at.
Byrant shot an officer as police tried to arrest him on drug-related charges, according to authorities. Officers returned fire and killed Bryant. The officer was treated for his gunshot wound.
On November 17th, 2015 Demetrius Bryant was killed by a police officer at.

An off-duty housing authority police officer shot Shane when he tried to rob the officer at gunpoint in a residential street, according to authorities. A second man involved in the attempted robbery fled the scene.
On November 15th, 2015 Shane Whitehead was killed by a police officer at.
400 W School House Ln, Philadelphia, PA 19144, USA
Gamino was fatally shot after fighting with a deputy who was responding to a report that someone was drinking alcohol in a park, according to authorities.
On November 13th, 2015 Ernesto Gamino was killed by a police officer at.
Rouselle Dr & Wysocki Ln, Mira Loma, CA 91752, USA

Marshall, who was being held at a Denver jail, was physically restrained by deputies before he experienced a 'medical emergency' and was taken to hospital. He was taken off life support nine days later. A medical examiner later said Marshall's death was a homicide and that he died from 'complications of positional asphyxia ... due to being physically restrained by law enforcement'.
On November 11th, 2015 Michael Marshall was killed by a police officer at.
490 W Colfax Ave, Denver, CO 80204, USA

Mesaros, a suspect in a home-invasion robbery, led police from several agencies on two high-speed car chases after being spotted. He was shot by officers after 'displaying a firearm', according to authorities. Another suspect was taken into custody.
On November 10th, 2015 Jason Mesaros was killed by a police officer at.
Colorado State Patrol, Longmont Police Department, Adams County Sheriff's Office
US-85 & W Bromley Ln, Brighton, CO 80601, USA
Police shot and wounded Ott after he pointed an air rifle at them when they responded to a disturbance at his house, authorities said. Ott died from his gunshot wounds about two months later.
On November 10th, 2015 Dana Ott was killed by a police officer at.
5100 Lanagan St, Colorado Springs, CO 80919, USA

Police shot Acevedo when he walked out of a house and fired shots at officers, according to authorities. Officials later said Acevedo had taken a woman hostage and then killed her before the confrontation with officers.
On November 9th, 2015 Leonel Acevedo was killed by a police officer at.
4400 Camden Ave, San Jose, CA 95124, USA
Officers fatally shot Lemieux after she pointed a gun at them, officials said. Lemieux was discovered 'randomly discharging' her gun by officers responding to a report of an 'active shooter'.
On November 5th, 2015 Laura Lemieux was killed by a police officer at.
Whisper Way, Goose Creek, SC 29445, USA

Officers shot Smith when he turned toward them and reached for his pocket, police said. Authorities said they believed Smith was armed and were pursuing him because was wanted on several felony warrants. No weapon was recovered.
On November 4th, 2015 Timothy Smith was killed by a police officer at.
Grand Ave & Jewell St, San Diego, CA 92109, USA

Jeremy was fatally shot while a passenger in a car driven by his father, Chris Few. Initial reports suggested that Few had backed his car into officers' vehicles while officers were trying to serve him with a warrant. But officials later said there was no evidence of a warrant existing for Few, who was unarmed. Few was also struck by gunfire but was in stable condition. Two officers involved in the shooting, Norris Greenhouse Jr and Derrick Stafford, were charged with second-degree murder in connection with Jeremy's death.
On November 3rd, 2015 Jeremy Mardis was killed by a police officer at.
Martin Luther King Dr, Marksville, LA 71351, USA

Smith died shortly after he was found unconscious and handcuffed while in the custody of special police officers, according to authorities. Special police officers are armed security guards licensed by the city. A medical examiner said Smith's death was a homicide and that 'compression of torso' was a contributing factor.
On November 1st, 2015 Alonzo Smith was killed by a police officer at.
2300 Good Hope Rd SE, Washington, DC 20020, USA
Cook was shot after exchanging gunfire with officers, police said. Authorities said they had been searching for Cook for nearly a week after he shot and injured a police officer in Tennessee.
On October 30th, 2015 Floyd Cook was killed by a police officer at.
Kentucky State Police, United States Marshals Service
A Swat team was serving a warrant at Graham's house, police said. An officer shot Graham when he opened the door and turned toward police with a gun in his hand, according to authorities.
On October 28th, 2015 Jerry Graham Jr was killed by a police officer at.

US Marshals Service members approached Dehart, who was wanted for attempted murder and other charges, when he fled in car, police said. Officers from the Marshals Service and the Oregon State Police pursued Dehart for 17 miles, during which Dehart shot at officers from his car, according to authorities. Officers who were alerted shot and killed Dehart as he approached, police said. Authorities have not identified the agency that shot him.
On October 28th, 2015 Andrew Dehart was killed by a police officer at.
Dennis L. Edwards Tunnel, Forest Grove, OR 97116, USA

Officers chased Igbuhay and three others who were driving in a stolen car and eventually caught up with them near a swamp, police said. Igbuhay was shot after he allegedly tried to drown a police dog and an officer in the water, police said. Igbuhay's girlfriend, who says she witnessed the shooting, contests the police account, claiming that the encounter between Igbuhay and police happened on dry land.
On October 26th, 2015 Kobvey Igbuhay was killed by a police officer at.
N Dale Mabry Hwy & W Waters Ave, Tampa, FL 33614, USA

Banta was involved in a fender bender and fled in his vehicle. Police responded to the scene, and later found Banta's vehicle nearby. An hour after police located the vehicle, Banta was seen taking items from it, and officers again returned to the scene. Banta fled on foot and was pursued by officers. Banta fired at an officer from a hiding spot under a bridge. Officer Rick Stevenson testified that he saw the silhouette of Banta underneath the bridge and was able to make out the gleam of a gun and a puff of smoke just before he was shot. Stevenson said he fell onto the ditch's southern bank, rolled onto his back and returned fire with a semiautomatic assault rifle. Other officers positioned along the ditch unloaded their .40-caliber pistols into Banta, who was hit with 10 full rounds and peppered with numerous bullet fragments that ricocheted off the bridge's cement embankment, killing him.

Jimmy Stephen Wren died about two months after being shot by trooper Phillip Mitchell. Mitchell initially stopped Wren at the Springville Grocery and accused Wren of speeding in a school zone on Highway 9 South. According to sources, the trooper spotted a handgun in Wrens pocket when he stepped from his red Toyota truck. Moments later, Wren reportedly jumped back into his truck and a high speed chase followed, moving from Highway 9 South to Highway 341 South, southeast on Montgomery Road and east on Moorman Road. Wren was reportedly able to put some distance between himself and Mitchell's car on the winding gravel road and was allegedly standing in the road with the gun drawn as Mitchell rounded the last curve before the Moorman Road bridge. According to reports, Mitchell got out of his car with his .12-gauge shotgun and fired at the suspect, hitting him several times. Mitchell Was unharmed. Wren was initially paralyzed by the shooting and eventually died on Feb. 14, 2005
On October 19th, 2004 Jimmy Stephen "Steve" Wren was killed by a police officer at 1900 Moorman Road, Pontotoc, MS 38863, USA.

The officers fired numerous taser darts into Michael Sanderss body. The officers then handcuffed Sanders, placed him face down on a gurney, which suffocated him, and then placed him in an ambulance. Brian Parrish reportedly committed suicide following a four-county police chase. Parrish had reportedly kidnapped his estranged wife from her work place, Money-N-Minutes, on Highway 15 in New Albany at about 8:30 a.m. When Parrish's van was spotted not long afterwards, New Albany police and Highway Patrol troopers began pursuit. At least eight agencies were involved in the pursuit by the end. Parrish reportedly fired shots at officers as the chase continued onto Highway 25 into Amory, where stop sticks flattened each tire on Parrish's vehicle. He drove on for another 1.5 miles before Lee County Sgt. Steve Stanford cornered the van in a front lawn in a residential area across from Amory High School. Stanford pulled the woman out of the van just before Parrish turned the pistol on himself.
On March 28th, 2003 Brian Keith Parrish was killed by a police officer at 1212 Boulevard Drive North, Amory, MS 38821, USA.

Alaouf, a former corrections officer, apparently threatened to kill his parents, burn down their house and kill police after buying a small arsenal of weapons. Interviews with neighbors revealed that Alaouf lived reclusively and may have suffered from mental illness.

Stewart was on the run after having failed to report to a six-year prison term for burglary. He took a family hostage and had them in the car during a high speed pursuit by police. He shot at police after a rollover accident, and they shot back, killing him. The hostages were uninjured.

A murder suspect fleeing police stormed into Hall's sister's residence, taking her and several children hostage, and beginning a 51-hour standoff. Mistakenly targeted because of her skin tone, Jamaica-born Hall was killed by a single bullet to the chest from a police sharpshooter. The other hostages were released when the suspect killed himself. Hall's family later settled with the city and county for $3.9M.

On April 26, 2000, Adam Boston and Darryl Lloyd Berkley allegedly robbed Jerry Comer's BP gas station. After they left the station, Comer called the police and began following after them at a distance. Boston and Berkley were detained by deputy Barbara Valor several blocks away. The deputy was handcuffing Berkley when he began struggling with Valor. According to Gregg Walker, spokesman for the King County Sheriff's Office, Boston was not involved in the struggle with a sheriff's deputy. The deputy's gun went off in the struggle and Jerry Comer, who had come up right before the altercation, shot with his personal weapon as well. Adam Boston was fatally shot. The sheriff's office believes that the bullet from his body came from Jerry Comer's gun.
On April 26th, 2000 Adam Boston was killed by a police officer at South 118th Street, Seattle, WA, USA.
516 3Rd Ave, W-116 King Co Courthouse, Seattle, WA, 98104

Two local officers on a DUI task force shot and killed Held in his pickup truck near a warehouse, claiming he tried to run them down. The two expended 49 bullets, each reloading.
